forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
